verses.verse: "Is not <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H6635>forced<s%> to <S%H6635>labor<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%> And [are not] his <S%H3117>days<s%> like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%>?
"As a <S%H5650>slave<s%> who <S%H7602>pants<s%> for the <S%H6738>shade,<s%> And as a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>man<s%> who <S%H6960>eagerly<s%> <S%H6960>waits<s%> for his <S%H6467>wages,<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> am I <S%H5157>allotted<s%> <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> And <S%H3915>nights<s%> of <S%H5999>trouble<s%> are <S%H4487>appointed<s%> me.

<S%H518>"When<s%> I <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4970>'When<s%> shall I <S%H6965>arise<s%>?' But the <S%H6153>night<s%> <S%H4058>continues,<s%> And I am <S%H7646>continually<s%> <S%H5076>tossing<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H5399>dawn.<s%>
"My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H7415>worms<s%> and a <S%H1487>crust<s%> of <S%H6083>dirt;<s%> My <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H9542>hardens<s%> and <S%H9242>runs.<s%>
"My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a weaver's <S%H708>shuttle,<s%> And <S%H3615>come<s%> to an <S%H3615>end<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> that my <S%H9132>life<s%> is [but] <S%H7307>breath,<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> will not <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>
"The <S%H5869>eye<s%> of him who <S%H7210>sees<s%> me will <S%H7789>behold<s%> me <S%H3808>no<s%> more; Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> [will be] on me, but I will not be.
"When a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3615>vanishes,<s%> it is <S%H1980>gone,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> he who <S%H3381>goes<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> does not <S%H5927>come<s%> up.
"He will not <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5234>know<s%> him <S%H5750>anymore.<s%>

<S%H1571>"Therefore,<s%> I will not <S%H2820>restrain<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H9496>anguish<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> I will <S%H7878>complain<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
"Am I the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> the <S%H8577>sea<s%> <S%H8577>monster,<s%> That Thou dost <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4929>guard<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me?
<S%H3588>"If<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> 'My <S%H6210>bed<s%> will <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, My <S%H4904>couch<s%> will <S%H5375>ease<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint,<s%>'
Then Thou dost <S%H2865>frighten<s%> me with <S%H2472>dreams<s%> And <S%H1204>terrify<s%> me by <S%H2384>visions;<s%>
So that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> would <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H4267>suffocation,<s%> <S%H4194>Death<s%> <S%H4480>rather<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> my <S%H6106>pains.<s%>
"I <S%H3988>waste<s%> <S%H3988>away;<s%> I will not <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H2308>Leave<s%> me <S%H4480>alone,<s%> for my <S%H3117>days<s%> are [but] a <S%H1892>breath.<s%>
<S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H582>man<s%> that Thou dost <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him, And that Thou art <S%H7896>concerned<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H413>about<s%> him,
That Thou dost <S%H6485>examine<s%> him every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> And <S%H974>try<s%> him every <S%H7281>moment<s%>?

"Wilt Thou <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H8159>turn<s%> Thy <S%H8159>gaze<s%> away from me, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H7503>let<s%> me <S%H7503>alone<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I <S%H1104>swallow<s%> my <S%H7536>spittle<s%>?

"Have I <S%H2398>sinned<s%>? <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6466>done<s%> to Thee, O <S%H5341>watcher<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>? <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast Thou <S%H7760>set<s%> me as Thy <S%H4645>target,<s%> So that I <S%H1961>am<s%> a <S%H4853>burden<s%> to myself?

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> then dost Thou not <S%H5375>pardon<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> And <S%H5674>take<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>? For <S%H6258>now<s%> I will <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> And Thou wilt <S%H7836>seek<s%> me, but I will not be."
